Address.label: Address
Address.value: 550 SOUTH CHURCH STREET, CHARLOTTE, North Carolina, 28202-1803, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Duke Energy is one of the largest U.S. utilities, with regulated utilities in the Carolinas, Indiana, Florida, Ohio, and Kentucky that deliver electricity to nearly 8 million customers. Its natural gas utilities serve more than 1.5 million customers. Duke operates in three major segments: electric utilities and infrastructure; gas utilities and infrastructure; and commercial renewables.
